titleInfo.title: Characterisation of a blowfly male-specific neuron using behaviourally generated visual stimuli
Journal of Comparative Physiology A-Neuroethology Sensory Neural and Behavioral Physiology

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Trischler, C., Böddeker, N., & Egelhaaf, M. (2007). Characterisation of a blowfly male-specific neuron using behaviourally generated visual stimuli. Journal of Comparative Physiology A-Neuroethology Sensory Neural and Behavioral Physiology, 193(5), 559-572. https://doi.org/10.1007/s00359-007-0212-3
